casebody.data:
STATE
v.
William Henry RAINES. No. 211A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 12, 2007. Jonathan E. Broun, Durham, for Raines. William P. Hart, Senior Deputy Attorney General, Joan Cunningham, Assistant Attorney General, Jeff Hunt, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 29th day of January 2007 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (William Henry Raines) shall have up to and-including the 16th day of February 2007 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 12th day of February 2007."
